entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
